did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: East Bloomfield Grange No. 94 membership list, 1874-1916.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: East Bloomfield Grange No. 94 (East Bloomfield, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two volumes containing a list of charter members and a list of members with ages, date of receiving the 1st to 4th degrees (1874-1916), signature and occupation; and articles of organization.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Two volumes containing a list of charter members and a list of members with ages, date of receiving the 1st to 4th degrees (1874-1916), signature and occupation; and articles of organization.
